page.title: 18IMPROVING NORTH HOLMWOOD
page.content: IMPROVING THE AREA: Sixty children aged 12 were asked about improvements they would like to see in their area. These are the six most popular choices: 1)Provision of properly equiped play areas near the estates. 2)No furthur building of new houses or offices. 3)Cycle tracks to be built on the sides of main roads. 4)A footbridge across the Horsham Road and a pelican croosing to be reopened at Spook Hill,near the shops. 5)More garages/parking areas are to be supplied on the Goodwyns Estate.The grass verges are being spoilt by people parking their Cars on them. 6)Dog toilets to be built to stop fouling on paths and public places.
